wikipedia_page.main: Luke Garrard (born 22 September 1985) is an English former professional footballer who manages National League club Boreham Wood.

response: In June 2021, Doyley was announced as the new assistant manager to Luke Garrard at National League side Boreham Wood. Doyley's former Watford teammate Connor Smith was also announced as player/coach alongside his duties as club academy manager.
